remarks: The partial sums in an extended sum form a monotonic sequence. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Aug-2017.)
statement:
esumpmono.1 $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
esumpmono.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
esumpmono.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. NN ) -> A e. ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) $.
esumpmono $p |- ( ph -> sum* k e. ( 1 ... M ) A <_ sum* k e. ( 1 ... N ) A ) $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
